title: 588 10 "Meeting Again After Two Years! Luffy and Law!"Transliteration: "Ni-nen Buri no Saikai! Rufi to Rō" (Japanese:2年ぶりの再会！ルフィとロー) Yoshihiro Ueda Tomohiro Nakayama March 24, 2013(2013-03-24) October 9, 2022
transformers_text: 588 10 Meeting Again After Two Years Luffy and Law Transliteration Ni nen Buri no Sai kai Ru fi to R Japanese 2 Yoshihiro Ueda Tomohiro Nakayama March 24 2013 2013 03 24 October 9 2022 T as hig i tries to see what happened in the fight Luffy's group sees the flying warship Luffy sees Law and says thanks for saving him two years ago Law says that they aren't friends and Luffy agrees since they were both after One Piece Law remembers the past between him and Luffy when Law saved him at Marine ford Luffy sees Smoker on the ground T as hig i cries over Smoker's body and attempts to kill Law but he switches their hearts Meanwhile the kids from the lab complain about the cold so the samurai uses his devil fruit to give the kids and the Straw Hats warm clothes Luffy's group then meets up with the other group behind the lab While going over what happened Robin reveals that Law became a Warlord two years ago and the samurai reveals that Law is the one who cut him in thirds and reunites with his legs Law meets up with Caesar Clown who Smoker speculates was behind everything on the island
tf_idf_text: meet two year luffy law transliteration nen buri sai kai japanese yoshihiro ueda tomohiro nakayama march october hig try see happened fight luffys group see fly warship luffy see law say thanks save two year ago law say arent friend luffy agrees since one piece law remembers past luffy law save marine ford luffy see smoker ground hig cry smoker body attempt kill law switch hearts meanwhile kid lab complain cold samurai use devil fruit give kid straw hat warm clothes luffys group meet group behind lab go happen robin reveals law become warlord two year ago samurai reveals law one cut third reunite legs law meet caesar clown smoker speculate behind everything island
